fields.description: Very good natured, attractive bird. Great for beginners.
fields.plumage: Black body with metallic colour sheen. Often copper neck.

fields.description: Gentle and placid. Large hybrid breed.
fields.plumage: Light blue-grey body. Black head and neck.

fields.description: Placid natured bird with feathered feet.
fields.plumage: Black with copper hue around lower body.

fields.description: Dual Purpose Bird. Very friendly, ideal for beginners and kids.
fields.plumage: White body. Black tail and mottled black neck.

fields.description: Very popular breed. 2 year laying period. Gentle and Placid.
fields.plumage: Classic red-brown plumage with variations of white tail feathers.

fields.description: Produces large eggs. Placid but shy bird, known for characteristic large comb.
fields.plumage: White all over with fan shaped tail.

fields.description: Fast growth and meat production. Not suited for reproduction.
Dual purpose breed. Multi-range of egg colours. Require good amount of space.
fields.plumage: Attractive bird with varying mottled plumage, from white-bay to white-black.

fields.description: Favourite layer duck, valued for high production. Extremely hardy.
fields.plumage: Simple to tan to buff colour.
